# castai_cache_configuration (Resource)

Manage CAST AI DBO Cache Configuration. Cache configurations define caching behavior for specific databases within a cache group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example: Basic cache configuration for a database
resource "castai_cache_group" "example" {
  protocol_type = "MySQL"
  name          = "my-cache-group"
  cluster_id    = "your-cluster-id"
  instance_id   = "your-database-instance-id"
}

resource "castai_cache_configuration" "database1" {
  cache_group_id = castai_cache_group.example.id
  database_name  = "production_db"
  enabled        = true
  default_ttl    = "Auto"
}

# Example: Multiple database configurations in the same cache group
resource "castai_cache_configuration" "database2" {
  cache_group_id = castai_cache_group.example.id
  database_name  = "analytics_db"
  enabled        = true
  default_ttl    = "Manual"
}

# Example: Disabled cache configuration (required field)
resource "castai_cache_configuration" "database3" {
  cache_group_id = castai_cache_group.example.id
  database_name  = "staging_db"
  enabled        = false  # Required: must explicitly set to true or false
}

# Output the cache configuration details
output "prod_db_cache_config" {
  value = {
    database_name = castai_cache_configuration.database1.database_name
    enabled       = castai_cache_configuration.database1.enabled
    default_ttl   = castai_cache_configuration.database1.default_ttl
  }
  description = "Production database cache configuration"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cache_group_id` (String) ID of the cache group this configuration belongs to.
- `database_name` (String) Logical database name to cache.
- `mode` (String) Caching mode for this database. Valid values: Auto, DontCache, Manual.

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
- `read` (String)
- `update` (String)
